languages.text: "Знаю, ты жаждешь меня убить. Нацелишь ли ты клинок в мое сердце, когда я повернусь к тебе спиной?"

traits.locale_text: "Знаю, ты жаждешь меня убить. Нацелишь ли ты клинок в мое сердце, когда я повернусь к тебе спиной?"

languages.text: "I know you long to kill me. Will you aim your blade at my heart when I turn my back on you?"
languages.original_text: "Знаю, ты жаждешь меня убить. Нацелишь ли ты клинок в мое сердце, когда я повернусь к тебе спиной?"

traits.locale_text: "I know you long to kill me. Will you aim your blade at my heart when I turn my back on you?"
"I know you long to kill me. Will you aim your blade at my heart when I turn my back on you?"
"I know you long to kill me. Will you aim your blade at my heart when I turn my back on you?"
"I know you long to kill me. Will you aim your blade at my heart when I turn my back on you?"
"I know you long to kill me. Will you aim your blade at my heart when I turn my back on you?"
"I know you long to kill me. Will you aim your blade at my heart when I turn my back on you?"

languages.text: «Sé que deseas matarme. ¿Dirigirás tu daga contra mi corazón cuando te dé la espalda?».
languages.original_text: "I know you long to kill me. Will you aim your blade at my heart when I turn my back on you?"

languages.text: 「お前が我を殺したがっていると知っている。我が背を向けたとたん、お前はその刃を我の心臓に突きつけるのか？」
languages.original_text: "I know you long to kill me. Will you aim your blade at my heart when I turn my back on you?"

languages.text: “我知道你一直都想杀我。当我背对你的时候，你会把利刃对准我的心脏吗？”
languages.original_text: "I know you long to kill me. Will you aim your blade at my heart when I turn my back on you?"

languages.text: "Ich weiß, Ihr wollt mich töten. Werdet Ihr Eure Klinge auf mein Herz richten, wenn ich Euch den Rücken zuwende?"
languages.original_text: "I know you long to kill me. Will you aim your blade at my heart when I turn my back on you?"

languages.text: « Je sais que vous souhaitez ardemment ma mort. Pointerez-vous votre lame vers mon cœur dès que j'aurai le dos tourné ? »
languages.original_text: "I know you long to kill me. Will you aim your blade at my heart when I turn my back on you?"
"I know you long to kill me. Will you aim your blade at my heart when I turn my back on you?"

languages.text: "Beni öldürmeyi arzuladığını biliyorum. Sana sırtımı döndüğümde kılıcını kalbime saplayacak mısın?"
languages.original_text: "I know you long to kill me. Will you aim your blade at my heart when I turn my back on you?"
